name: Proxball
description:
Proxball is a party multiplayer game, playable by everyone, even without any gaming experience. Everyone can start playing immediately without the need of a tutorial or any long introduction. The main goal and controls are easy explained. The varied stages, different character behaviours and many items result in a chaotic but controllable and tactical gameplay where everyone can have fun.

It’s best to play in local mode with friends, but it’s also possible to play against an AI or online via programs like Parsec against your friends.

The playable game is still in an early stage of development. There'll be many more characters, stages and features to come in the future!
